items.name: Yokohama
items.description: Our specialty-Also known as lekei (pronounced E-A-K). Thick noodles, in pork tonkotsu & chicken broth seasoned with shoyu tare. Topped with pork belly

items.name: Fukuoka
items.description: Thin noodles in a pork tonkotsu broth seasoned with shio tare. Topped with five spice ground pork, shitake mushrooms, and menma. (Gluten free option)

items.name: Tokyo
items.description: Thin noodles in a clear chicken broth seasoned with shoyu tare & finished with dried niboshi. Topped with pork belly chashu, narutokmaki, shitake mushrooms, and menma.

items.name: Misawa
items.description: Thin noodles in a chicken and soy based broth flavored with shiro miso tare. Topped with chashu chicken, spinach, corn, and a pat of butter.

items.name: Sapporo
items.description: Thick noodles in pork tonkotsu & chicken broth seasoned with a slightly spicy aka miso tare. Pork belly chashu, corn, a pat of butter, marinated mustard greens, & menma.

items.name: Hiyashi Chuka
items.description: Blanched ramen noodles tossed in a light shoyu & rice vinegar dressing. Topped with sliced sweet peppers, tomatoes, spinach, and more ramen toppings. Add-ons available. (Vegan)

items.name: Vegan Tokyo
items.description: Thin noodles served in a kombu dashi broth seasoned with shio tare. Topped with fried tofu, shitake mushrooms, and menma.

items.name: Udon
items.description: Thick, chewy flour noodles served in a kombu dashi broth seasoned with shio tare. Build-your-own bowl add-ons available. (Vegan)

AO.name: Extras
AO.description: Ajitama (ramen egg) | Negi (green onion) | Nori (seaweed), Menma (bamboo) | Corn | Spinach | Marinated mustard greens | Bean sprouts | Shitake mushrooms | Kikurage (marinated wood ear mushrooms) | Narutomaki (fish cake)

AO.name: Sauces
AO.description: Black garlic myu sauce | Jigoku tare (house hot sauce)

AO.name: Proteins
AO.description: Fried tofu | Pork belly chashu | Chicken chashu | Five spice ground pork

items.name: Vegetable Curry
items.description: Vegan and vegetarian curry. Build-your-own with add-ons. (Vegan, Vegetarian)

items.name: Karaage Chicken Curry
items.description: Marinated chicken thighs breaded & fried.

items.name: Pork Katsu Curry
items.description: Panko breaded, fried, and sliced pork loin.

items.name: Yokosuka Beef Curry
items.description: Thinly sliced and seared beef.

items.name: Curry Udon
items.description: Udon noodles in a thick curry Kombu dashi. Add-ons available. (Vegan)

AO.name: Extras

items.name: House Salad
items.description: Baby spinach and arugula topped with bean sprouts & sliced radish, served with shoyu vinaigrette or sesame dressing. (Gluten free, Vegetarian, Vegan option)

items.name: Edamame
items.description: Seasoned with salt & Shichimi Togarashi. (Gluten free, Vegan)

items.name: Garlic Shoyu Edamame
items.description: Tossed in a slightly spicy garlic & shoyu sauce with sesame seeds. (Vegan)

items.name: Agedashi Tofu
items.description: Fried tofu served in our kombu dashi broth with sesame seed & green onion. (Vegan)

items.name: Ube Wedges
items.description: Fried Okinawan purple potato wedges. Served with miso Kewpie mayo. (Gluten free, Vegetarian)

items.name: Furikake Fries
items.description: Furikake seasoning, miso Kewpie & Jigoku tare spicy ketchup side. (Gluten free, Vegetarian, Vegan option)

items.name: Ramen Loaded Fries
items.description: Pork belly chashu, green onion, miso Kewpie drizzle & jigoku tare ketchup side.

items.name: Shishito Peppers
items.description: Blistered mild & thin-walled peppers. Served with lemon & kewpie mayo. (Gluten free, Vegan option)

items.name: Shishito Peppers & Pork Belly
items.description: Blistered shishito peppers topped with pork belly chashu & balsamic reduction. Served with lemon & kewpie mayo.

items.name: Shiitake Gyoza
items.description: Handmade gyoza. Shiitake mushroom, cabbage, green onion, & more filling served with a house shoyu dipping sauce. (Vegetarian)

items.name: Pork Belly Chashu Gyoza
items.description: Handmade gyoza. Pork belly chashu & vegetable filling served with a house shoyu dipping sauce.

items.name: Karaage Chicken Bites
items.description: Marinated chicken thighs, breaded, & fried. Served with lemon & kewpie mayo. Available in six or ten count portions. (Gluten free)

items.name: Yakitori Chicken Skewers
items.description: Two grilled, shoyu marinated chicken thigh skewers.

items.name: Flank Steak Skewers
items.description: Two grilled 2oz. Skewers served with spicy mustard & wasabi. (Gluten free)

items.name: Pork Skewers
items.description: Two grilled skewers marinated in sweet Mirin. Spicy mustard side. (Gluten-free)

items.description: Cold or hot. In a glass (5) or a caraffe (9).

items.description: Sauza tequila, Campari, Agave, fresh-pressed lime & grapefruit, topped with soda water & a hibiscus salt rim

items.name: Old Fashioned

items.description: Sazerac rye, Mata Hari absinthe, Peychaud's & Angostrua bitters, & agave. Served on the rocks with orange & lemon peel.

items.name: Manhattan

items.name: The Smoked Ishikawa

items.description: Svedka vodka, mitsuya cider simple, yuzu juice, & fresh pressed lemon. Served up with a Mitsuya Cider candy rim

items.name: Ube Milk Tea
items.description: Earl Gray infused Svedka vodka, ube condensed milk, simple, & half and half. Served on the rocks with boba pearls.

items.name: Royal Jelly
items.description: Shochu, orange bitters, grape reduction, glitter simple, fresh pressed lime & cranberry juice. Served up with grape coconut jelly.

items.name: Matcha Smash
items.description: The Tottori whisky, honey syrup, muddled mint & lemon. Served on the rocks with a matcha syrup finish.

items.name: Boss Old Fashioned
items.description: The Tottori Ex-bourbon barrel whisky, BOSS coffee reduction, Okinawan black sugar syrup, orange bitters & peel. Served on the rocks with a Gran Gala infused cherry.
